title: for...of
description: The `for...of` JS syntax statement is a loop that iterates over the values of an `Iterable` object, such as an `Array` or `String`, executing a block of code for each value.
content: The statement used as a loop structure that iterates over `Iterable` object like `Array` or `String` or `NodeList`, executing a block of code for each value in the collection one at a time.
